-- This script will create the table needed to load the load the data transformed
-- by Spark into the SQL Pool.

-- #############################################################################
-- DON'T FORGET TO CHOOSE BUILT-IN AND THE CORRECT DATABASE
-- #############################################################################

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Create Europe Soccer Events schema 'ese_Spark'
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'ese_Spark')
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [ese_Spark]');
GO

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Create tables
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF EXISTS (SELECT object_id FROM sys.objects obj JOIN sys.schemas sch ON obj.schema_id = sch.schema_id WHERE obj.NAME = 'GameEvents' AND sch.name = 'ese_Spark' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE [ese_Spark].[GameEvents]
GO

CREATE TABLE [ese_Spark].[GameEvents]
( 
	[id_odsp] [nvarchar](32)  NULL,
	[id_event] [nvarchar](32)  NULL,
	[sort_order] [int]  NULL,
	[time] [int]  NULL,
	[event_type] [int]  NULL,
	[event_type_str] [nvarchar](32)  NULL,
	[event_type2] [int]  NULL,
	[event_type2_str] [nvarchar](32)  NULL,
	[side] [int]  NULL,
	[side_str] [nvarchar](16)  NULL,
	[event_team] [nvarchar](128)  NULL,
	[opponent] [nvarchar](128)  NULL,
	[player] [nvarchar](128)  NULL,
	[player2] [nvarchar](128)  NULL,
	[player_in] [nvarchar](128)  NULL,
	[player_out] [nvarchar](128)  NULL,
	[shot_place] [int]  NULL,
	[shot_place_str] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[shot_outcome] [int]  NULL,
	[shot_outcome_str] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[is_goal] [int]  NULL,
	[location] [int]  NULL,
	[location_str] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[bodypart] [int]  NULL,
	[bodypart_str] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[assist_method] [int]  NULL,
	[assist_method_str] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[situation] [int]  NULL,
	[situation_str] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[country_code] [nchar](3)  NULL,
	[time_bin] [float]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)
GO
CREATE INDEX IX_GameEvents_isgoal_country ON [ese_Spark].[GameEvents](is_goal, country_code);
GO
